description:
After we first shared Chris with you two weeks ago, we got nothing but fantastic comments and emails from everyone. And pretty much everything was along the lines of 'We. Want. More. Chris.' LOL. So, here you go! We've got another solo of the mega-hung cutie in the War Chest this week and I'm still trying to pick my chin up off the floor. Hot damn Chris is gorgeous. Who wants to see him cross deeper into the Active Duty world? Show of hands please. Mmm-hmmm. Exactly what I thought: all of you!

We join my friend Mike behind the camera again with Chris, and after he's taken a shower, he returns to the bed for another tussle with that tube steak of his.

Try to see if you can make it through Chris' solo session this week without the uncontrollable desire to send an email to me, demanding we fly this guy in for a test in front of a Dink-directed camera. Oh, the tangled web we weave   once he's in our midst   Ok, wait, we're getting ahead of ourselves!
title: Chris
